nodes.text: First Order officers were officers who held a position of rank and authority in the First Order—a military junta inspired by the Galactic Empire. They wore distinctive dark uniforms and hats, and wielded the SE-44 or SE-44C models of blaster pistol. General Armitage Hux was one such officer. First Order officers of a particularly high rank were granted access to the Upsilon-class command shuttles. Because of the First Order believing in a hierarchy, it was forbidden for a stormtrooper to initiate contact with a First Order officer.
